participant_1.background:
I am generous with my family and friends.
i have two sons that i am raising by myself.
i take things very literally.
I moved to Los Angeles from Tokyo and my brothers helped me a lot, so I am making lunch for them to show my appreciation.
I joined a ski club and met a great group of friends.

participant_2.background:
I spent time with my family and friends.
I prefer to listen to my own music on my own terms.
I'm single and love my pets.
i m a police officer in a suburb of detroit.
I am a stay at home mom because my depression and anxiety makes it difficult for me to work outside the home.

content.text: I just moved to Los Angeles from Tokyo! My brothers helped me a lot so I am making them lunch as a thank you!
That is so nice of you! I love to cook too. What kind of food are you making them?
I am making them some sushi. I love sushi and I know they do too.
Sushi sounds delicious! I've never had it before.
You've never had sushi? You have to try it! It is so good!
I will have to try it sometime. Maybe you can make me some.
I'd love to make you some sushi!
Thanks! I love to cook too. I make a lot of soup.
Soup sounds delicious. I love soup. What kind of soup do you make?
I make a lot of different kinds of soup. My favorite is chicken noodle soup.
Chicken noodle soup is my favorite too!
It is! I love it when it's cold out.
Me too! It's the perfect food for a cold winter day.
